entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse Seriously?
 The first 2 months Coronavirus hit America trump did nothing but claim it was a Democrat hoax as people died!
Even now holding a trump rally in a closed environment 19,000 people putting American lives at risk in a city overwhelmed with Coronavirus.
Shameful!
